example.eg: The goals were at opposite ends of the field.
example.egtrans: 球门位于球场两端，相向而立。

example.eg: Every action has an equal and opposite reaction.
example.egtrans: 每一个作用力都有一个相等的反作用力。

example.eg: He started to get nervous when she sat opposite him on the train.
example.egtrans: 火车上她坐到他对面后，他开始觉得紧张。

example.eg: She saw a shadowy figure in the window of the building opposite.
example.egtrans: 她从对面大楼的窗户上看到了一个黑影。

example.eg: Whatever he wants to do, she does the opposite.
example.egtrans: 不管他做什么，她都会做相反的事情。

example.eg: Fascists and communists are diametrically opposed to one another.
example.egtrans: 法西斯主义者和共产主义者截然相反。

example.eg: The entrance and the exit are at diametrically opposite corners of the building.
My brother and I have diametrically opposite political views.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 截然相反的，南辕北辙的

example.eg: Carry straight on until you get to the cathedral - the post office is just opposite.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 就在对面地, 正对面

example.eg: You did just the opposite of what I advised.
She is just the opposite of her sister.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 正好相反的, 截然不同的

example.eg: You're going the wrong way.  Your house is in the opposite direction.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 反方向, 相反的方向

example.eg: Libertarianism and Communism are at opposite ends of the political spectrum.
Concerning politics, Joe's opinions were always the opposite of Mary's.
Magnets with like poles repel, while opposite poles attract.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 磁体的两极，正负极，磁极

example.eg: Those two people are on opposite poles from each other.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 截然相反的观点或看法

example.eg: John does not understand how to speak to the opposite sex.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与…对立, 和…形成对照
